column4: I can't put files onto my external HD from other computers. I've tried cd /media/your_external_drive // sudo chmod -R 777 - any help?
what do you mean by "from other computers". Have you set it up as NFS or iSCSI ?
I've tried it on two Mac OSX and its giving me a permission error. Should've mentioned it's NTFS
there's a few things you need to install to OSX before you can write to NTFS
